p: In this way, this study aims to evaluate the antimicrobial activity of several compounds in the essential oils of plants used in the Mexican Traditional Medicine of the Valley of Tehuacán-Cuicatlán, Puebla, that include α-pinene, β-pinene, carvacrol, eugenol, limonene, myrcene, ocimene, cineole, methyl salicylate, farnesene, and thymol.
